name: pull-with-latest
description: Combine a stream with the latest value from another stream

scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run deps && npm test
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.deps: dependency-check package.json && dependency-check package.json --unused --entry test/*.js -i dependency-check -i eslint -i eslint-config-minlint -i tap-spec

author: nichoth
